## Engine.getScriptObjects() method

Gets all scripts attached to a host.

Delegates to [ScriptingSystem.getScriptObjects()](doc/markdown/./scene.scriptingsystem.getscriptobjects.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getScriptObjects<T extends RuntimeScript<any>>(host: unknown): T[];
```

**Returns:**

T\[\]

Script instances attached to the host, or an empty array.
